sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_0586_til_post"> <x_0586_til_post action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <category display_value="Tricks">a8c6c0be1b8154908ed631d7dc4bcbef</category> <github_id>56</github_id> <github_url>https://github.com/iamkalai/SNTIL/issues/56</github_url> <message>If you want to open a left navigation menu in new window rather in the same window,  - create a module of type URL (from Arguments:) - add some text in 'window name' field.</message> <number>TIL0001052</number> <status>old</status> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-06-04 14:52:03</sys_created_on> <sys_id>f1cbf44c1b995c908ed631d7dc4bcb85</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-06-09 14:56:12</sys_updated_on> <title>Open Module In New Window</title> </x_0586_til_post> </record_update>
